attributes.action: scrap bedroom tax and council tax for the working class and poor families
attributes.additional_details: i beleive the country is in a state beyond repair, but you are forcing issues that will effect millions of low income families, council tax for younger generations, and bedroom taxes, we need to stop this now, the working class and poor families will have to go with out food or become homeless because of these changes the goverment needs to rethink and rethink fast or this country will come to a stand still for sure
